name: nOFFER
overview:
nOFFER is an exciting, new service connecting consumers looking to save time and money with local merchants seeking to drive business.

nOFFER for Consumers: People are busy. People like to save money. People like to support their local merchants. nOFFER helps consumers save time and money by putting specials, deals, and offers from local merchants in one place. Consumers can access the friendly neighborhood offers from their computer or internet enabled cell phone through the nOFFER website or by following the local nOFFER page on Twitter.

nOFFER for Merchants: Merchants have had no way to promote their business in real time based on current business conditions or inventory. nOFFER delivers customers when they are needed most. The platform enables merchants to post real time 140 character specials and deals and target â€œin marketâ€ consumers at the time the buying decision is made. Merchants also have the option of adding a custom landing page to provide greater content.
